DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to investigate the effects of positive end-expiratory pressure ventilation on intracranial pressure assessed by sonographic optic nerve sheath diameter in patients undergoing robot-assisted laparoscopic prostatectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of PEEP on Optic Nerve Sheath Diameter During Robot-Assisted Laparoscopic Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Effects of positive end-expiratory pressure ventilation on intracranial pressure have not been evaluated in patients undergoing laparoscopic surgery. We aim to investigate the effects of positive end-expiratory pressure ventilation on intracranial pressure assessed by sonographic optic nerve sheath diameter in patients undergoing robot-assisted laparoscopic prostatectomy.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are scheduled to undergo robotassisted laparoscopic prostatectomy Patients who have cerebrovascular disease or history of cerebrovascular disease Patients who are younger than 20 years
